channel.title: [Suggestion] Thanksgiving death animation idea
channel.description:
Hey, so I was reading the forum idly while thinking, when I realized the next major holiday coming up was Thanksgiving. What do you think of when you hear the word _Thanksgiving_? **Turkey!** How about a death animation in which you throw a rune down, turning your victim into a nicely cooked turkey dinner?
Just thought it'd be cool, and there's no harm in posting, haha.
